title: Make Steraks/Titanic scale off bonus HP
body:
Naturally bonus hp ratios would have to be higher than current max hp ratios. The goal would be to maintain their effectiveness on champions that build 2 - 3+ health items while making them far less appealing to squishies who should build lifesteal items for survivability/damage as intended.

EDIT: Another solution I saw that I like for steraks is to put a 3k health requirement to have the passive, similar to warmog's heart. Would be way simpler than trying to get the numbers right on bonus hp ratios too. Titanic hydra would still be an issue but it's unclear how hard the AD nerfs will affect it so the steraks change would be a good start.

Zed is a melee champion. Therefore he is inherently riskier than a ranged champion, as such he needs to consider defensive options to fight said ranged champions. Ranged champions have an advantage due to their range. That's why they tend to build closer to glass cannon than most champions. When ranged champions start to build tankier they should be sacrificing their ability to kill tanks.

Assassins have tools to deal with those risk without building tank items, that's the whole difference between them and ordinary diving bruisers. If they can still 100-0 with almost a bruiser build, marksman still being able to kill tanks - only slower - when building Gage are OK as well.

If an adc can reliably survive an assassin in a 1v1 scenario then they should not be able to, with the same itemization, kill any full tank champion at all. If an adc can kill a tank while dueling assassins then there is no reason to play assassins or less than 2 adcs a game.
